Verses: 1 karththar Yaakkobukku Irangi, Pinnum Isravelaraith Therindhukondu, Avargalai Avargal Dhesaththile Thaabarikkappannuvaar; Anniyarum Avargalodu Serkkaiyaagi Yaakkobin Vamsaththode Koodikkolvaargal.

2 janangal Avargalai Azhaiththukkondupoi Avargal Sthaanaththil Viduvaargal; Isravel Vamsaththaar Karththarudaiya Dhesaththile Avargalai Velaikkaararaagavum Velaikkaarigalaagavum Kaiyaandu, Thangalai Siraiyaakkinavargalai Siraiyaakki, Thangalai Odukkinavargalai Aaluvaargal.
3 karththar Un Dhukkaththaiyum, Un Thaththalippaiyum, Nee Adimaiyaakkappattirundha Kadinamaana Adimaiththanaththaiyum Neekki, Unnai Ilaippaarappannum Akkaalaththile,
4 nee Baabilon Raajaavinmel Sollum Vaakkiyamaavadhu: Odukkinavan Ozhindhuponaane! Ponnagari Ozhindhupoyitre!
5 karththar Dhushtarin Thandaayudhaththaiyum, Arasaandavargalin Sengolaiyum Muriththuppottaar.
6 ukkirankondu Oyaadha Adiyaai Janangalai Adiththu, Kobamaai Jaadhigalai Arasaandavan, Thaduppaarillaamal Thunbappaduththappadugiraan.
7 boomimuzhudhum Ilaippaari Amaindhirukkiradhu; Gembeeramaai Muzhangugiraargal.
8 dhevadhaaru Virutchangalum, Leebanonin Kedhurukkalum Unnimiththam Sandhoshappattu, Nee Vizhundhukidandhadhu Mudharkondu Engalai Vettavaruvaar Oruvarum Illai Endru Sollugiradhu.

9 keezhe Irukkira Paadhaalam Unnimiththam Adhirndhu, Un Varugaikku Edhirkondu, Boomiyil Adhipadhigalaayirundhu Seththa Raatchadhar Yaavaraiyum Unnimiththam Ezhuppi, Jaadhigaludaiya Ellaa Raajaakkalaiyum Avargaludaiya Singaasanangalilirundhu Ezhundhirukkappannugiradhu.
10 avargalellaarum Unnai Nokki: Neeyum Engalaippola Balatchayamaanaayo? Engalukku Samaanamaanaayo? Endru Solluvaargal.
11 un Aadambaramum, Un Vaaththiyangalin Muzhakkamum Paadhaalaththil Thallundupoyitru; Puzhukkale Un Padukkai, Poochchigale Un Porvai.
12 adhikaalaiyin Maganaagiya Vidivelliye, Nee Vaanaththilirundhu Vizhundhaaye! Jaadhigalai Eenappaduththinavane, Nee Tharaiyile Vizha Vettappattaaye!
13 naan Vaanaththukku Eruven, Dhevanudaiya Natchaththirangalukkumelaaga En Singaasanaththai Uyarththuven; Vadapurangalilulla Aaraadhanaik Koottaththin Parvadhaththile Veetriruppen Endrum,
14 naan Megangalukku Melaaga Unnadhangalil Eruven; Unnadhamaanavarukku Oppaaven Endrum Nee Un Irudhayaththil Sonnaaye.
15 aanaalum Nee Agaadhamaana Paadhaalaththile Thallunduponaai.
16 unnaik Kaangiravargal Unnai Utruppaarththu, Unnaik Kuriththu Sindhiththu Ivandhaanaa Boomiyaith Thaththalikkavum, Raajyangalai Adhiravum Seydhu,
17 ulagaththai Vanaandharamaakki, Adhin Nagarangalai Azhiththu, Siraippattavargalaith Thangal Veedugalukkup Pogavidaamalirundhavan Enbaargal.
18 jaadhigaludaiya Sagala Raajaakkalum, Avaravar Thangal Araiyile Magimaiyode Kidaththappattirukkiraargal.

19 neeyo Azhugippona Kilaiyaippolavum, Pattayakkuththaal Kolaiyundavargalin Uduppaippolavum, Oru Kuzhiyin Karkalukkulle Kidakkiravargalaippolavum, Kaalaal Midhikkappatta Pinaththaippolavum, Un Kallaraikkup Purambaai Erindhuvidappattaai.
20 nee Avargalode Adakkampannappaduvadhillai; Nee Un Dhesaththaik Keduththu Un Janaththaik Kondrupottaai; Theemaiseygiravargaludaiya Sandhadhi Orupodhum Perperuvadhillai.

21 avan Puththirar Ezhumbi Dhesaththai Sudhandhariththukkondu, Ulagaththaip Pattanangalaal Nirappaadhapadikku, Avargal Pidhaakkaludaiya Akkiramaththinimiththam Avargalaik Kolaiseyya Aayaththampannungal.

22 naan Avargalukku Virodhamaai Ezhumbuven Endru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar; Baabilonudaiya Peraiyum, Adhil Meendhirukkiradhaiyum, Puththiranaiyum Powththiranaiyum Sangarippenendru Karththar Sollugiraar.
23 adhai Mullampandrigalukku Sudhandharamum, Thanneer Nirkum Pallangalumaakki, Adhai Sangaaram Ennum Thudaippaththinaal Perukkividuven Endru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.
24 naan Ninaiththirukkirapadiye Nadakkum; Naan Nirnayiththapadiye Nilainirkum Endru Senaigalin Karththar Aanaiyittu Sonnaar.
25 aseeriyanai En Dhesaththile Muriththu, En Malaigalinmel Avanai Midhiththuppoduven; Appozhudhu Avanudaiya Nugam Avargalmelirundhu Vilagi, Avanudaiya Sumai Avargal Tholilirundhu Neengum.
26 dhesamanaiththinmelum Nirnayikkappatta Yosanai Idhuve; Sagala Jaadhigalmelum Neettappattirukkira Kaiyum Idhuve Endraar.
27 senaigalin Karththar Ippadi Nirnayiththirukkiraar, Yaar Adhai Viyarththamaakkuvaan? Avarudaiya Kai Neettappattirukkiradhu, Yaar Adhaith Thiruppuvaan?
28 aagaas Raajaa Maranamadaindha Varushaththile Undaana Baaram Ennavendraal:
29 muzhu Pelisthiyaave, Unnai Adiththa Kol Murindhadhendru Akkalippaayiraadhe; Paambin Verilirundhu Kattuviriyan Thondrum; Adhin Kani Parakkira Akkini Sarppamaayirukkum.
30 thariththirarin Thalaippillaigal Thirupthiyaaip Pusiththu, Eliyavargal Sugamaaip Paduththiruppaargal; Unveraip Panjaththinaale Saagappannuven, Unnil Meedhiyaanavargalai Avan Kondrupoduvaan.
31 vaasale Alaru; Nagarame Kadharu; Pelisthiyaave, Nee Muzhudhum Karaindhupogiraai; Enendraal, Vadakke Irundhu Pugaikkaadaai Varugiraan; Avan Koottangalil Thaniththavanillai.

32 ippodhum Indha Jaadhiyin Sthaanaapadhigalukku Enna Maaruththaravu Sollappadum? Karththar Seeyonai Asthibaarappaduththinaar; Avarudaiya Janaththil Sirumaiyaanavargal Adhile Thidankondu Thanguvaargal Enbadhe.
